value: The Canadian Forces Base is located south of the city and is home to the Snowbirds, a team of plane pilots who perform "aerobatics" flight demonstration. The base is home to an annual airshow every July, headlined by the Snowbirds.
Also located along the Trans-Canada Highway, Mac is a 10-meter tall cement moose. It is right next to the visitor imformation center.

content=2 hr long tours that takes you through underground tunnels.  There is the Al Capone Tour that shows you about bootlegging in the 20's.
There is also the Passage to fortune where you learn about the chinese immigrants and the head tax. Far from being simply a set of exhibits, the two tours are in fact interactive theatre productions where visitors interact with actors.

Moose Jaw Tunnels - a tourist destination. Offers two tours: that of Chinese labor workers and the legend of Al Capone.
